nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 63, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. East wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 0 to 5 mph.

nws.name: Friday

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 64. North northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 79. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
